name: Tizen Developers site
description: Apps development principles, tutorials, API documentation and packaging tools for Tizen TV apps.

name: Tizen Studio
description: IDE for apps development and Tizen TV Emulator.

name: Samrt View SDK
description: Oficcial Android, IOS and JavaScript SDK for communication between Samsung TV and mobile device.

name: samsungctl
description: Library and command line tool for remote controlling Samsung televisions via a TCP/IP connection. It currently supports both pre-2016 TVs as well most of the modern Tizen-OS TVs with Ethernet or Wi-Fi connectivity (Python).

name: samsung-tv-remote
description: Node.js module to remotely control Samsung Smart TV starting from 2016 (JavaScript).

name: homebridge-samsungtv2016
description: Plugin for Homebridge that allows you to control your 2016 Samsung TV with HomeKit and Siri (JavaScript).

name: Developers site
description: Development principles, tutorials, API documentation and packaging tools for webOS TV apps.

name: webOS TV SDK
description: IDE for apps development including a Command Line Interface and emulator.

name: Connect SDK
description: Open source framework developed by LG that connects your mobile apps with multiple media device platforms. Currently supports 8 platforms. But seems abandoned.

name: lgtv2
description: Node.js module for remote control of LG WebOS TV via WebSocket messages (JavaScript).

name: node-red-contrib-lgtv
description: Module for Node-RED allowing  remote control of LG webOS Smart TVs (JavaScript).

name: node-webos
description: Node.js module to discover and control webOS TVs (JavaScript).

name: pylgtv
description: Library to control webOS based LG Tv devices (Python).

name: LGWebOSRemote
description: Command line tool for webOS remote control of LG TVs (Python).

name: Android TV Developers site
description: Official documentation, tutorials and best practises for building Android TV apps.

name: tvOS Developers Site
description: Official SDK, documentation and tutorials for writing tvOS apps.

name: Google Cast SDK
description: Official Google Cast SDK documentation and tutorials.

name: TVs with Chromecast built-in
description: List of vendors supporting built-in Chromecast and advantages over traditional TV remote controller.

name: TOAST
description: Samsung open-source framework for multi-platform TV apps developemnt.

name: Enyo
description: LG framework for development apps for all major platforms, from phones and tablets to PCs and TVs.

name: Smartbox
description: Smart TV universal library for Samsung, LG, Philips, SmartTV Aliance, STB Mag app development.

name: Creating a Samsung Tizen TV Web App
Getting Started with a Samsung Smart TV
Build Your First App for webOS TV
DLNA
description: Industry-wide standard for sharing data over a home network. Depending on the DLNA-compatible devices you own, you might be able to stream films from your laptop to your TV, play an MP3 stored on your phone over your hi-fi system, or print a photo from your tablet on your home printer.

name: DIAL
description: Developed by Netflix and Google, this protocol alows client devices (like smartphone, tablet, or computer) to discover apps on server devices (like a smart TV or streaming box) and launch content on them.

name: Wi-Fi Direct
description: Standard enabling devices to easily connect with each other without requiring a wireless access point.

name: Miracast
description: Standard for wireless connections from devices (such as laptops, tablets, or smartphones) to displays (such as TVs, monitors or projectors). Works over Wi-Fi Direct.

name: Use DIAL to Cast Netflix and YouTube Without a Chromecast
LG WebOS communication
description: Unofficial but detailed description of communication with webOS TV.

name: LG Magic Motion Remote
description: Point, Click, and Control - Operate TV like a computer mouse.

name: Samsung Smart TV Apps Developer Forum
